title: Online Real-Time Science Education Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level knowledge in scientific fields and basic online learning experience
context.additional_context: Course focused on real-time science education design using digital devices, emphasizing content structuring and assessment methods suitable for administrator/leader role learners.

learning_goals: One can apply at least three instructional design strategies to enhance learner engagement in online science education
One can design activities that optimize learners' germane cognitive load through formative assessment
One can develop at least two interaction techniques to increase learners' intention to use future educational materials
One can implement designs that improve science concept delivery efficiency by over 20% in large-scale online environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
